code: import React from'react';import{Input}from'semantic-ui-react';function Login(){var User=document.getElementById('Users');var Passwd=document.getElementById('Password');var LoginInfo={"User":"DevStorm","Password":"thdcksdn;;"};if(LoginInfo['User']===User.value&&LoginInfo['Password']===Passwd.value){alert("\uC624 \uB2D8\uC740 ".concat(LoginInfo['User']," \uB2D8\uC774\uC2DC\uAD70\uC694! \uC2B9\uC778 \uB418\uC5C8\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."));window.location.replace('/society');}else{alert('오 님은 안됨');}}function enterkey(){document.addEventListener('keydown',function(e){var keyCode=e.keyCode;if(keyCode===13){Login();}});}function Society(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"Society",style:{textAlign:'center',fontSize:"30px"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Input,{type:"text",id:"Users",placeholder:"Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Input,{onKeyUp:enterkey(),type:"password",id:"Password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Input,{type:"submit",onClick:Login}));}export default Society;
